Class ShipGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Views.ShipGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    public class ShipGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This is view for User grid and contains its ship placed rendered by the Player.java class.
